remarks: The projective subspace closure is a subset of closed subspace closure. (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pclss2pol.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
pclss2pol.o $e |- ._|_ = ( _|_P ` K ) $.
pclss2pol.c $e |- U = ( PCl ` K ) $.
pclss2polN $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X C_ A ) -> ( U ` X ) C_ ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` X ) ) ) $.
